Summary: Small sphere smaller than my 1884 Mercury Marquis and completely chrome.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Clinton
There were no other sightings in Clinton on or around August 8th 1988
divs: Sighting DetailsLeft ex-wifes fathers home in Clinton and was heading home on River Road south. Noticed chromelike sphere settling above car as we drove. Almost seems attached. Also reflected any light that might have hit it like my instrument panel. Wife at time was pregnant. She was able to lean forward to see object better than I. As we traveled on and came to a gully, it stayed with us until we started uphill and it banked left and slowly traveled away and above the field. There was no noise. No time lost. did not see anything else that night pertaining to what we saw. Never felt threatened.
